section.p: ‘In Chambara,’ says one of the sailors, ‘I once saw a knight cut a man down and walk away, with no better excuse than to test the edge of his sword.’
‘The Akatsurese are bloodthirsty fiends,’ says the ship’s carpenter. ‘And yet, do you know what they call us? Whitefaced devils! They are irredeemable!’
Where will you set your course?

choices.choice: South to the Sea of Hydras
